quizzes.question: Which three different sources are responsible for the styles you see on the web page?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Cascade[/h1]

The final appearance of a web page is a result of different styling rules. 

The three main sources of style information that form a cascade are:

- The stylesheet created by the [b]author of the page[/b]
- The [b]browser's default styles[/b]
- Styles specified [b]by the user[/b]
